remoteClasses.name: WebRtcEndpoint
remoteClasses.doc: WebRtcEndpoint interface. This type of ``Endpoint`` offers media streaming using WebRTC.

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the endpoint belongs

methods.name: gatherCandidates
methods.doc:
Init the gathering of ICE candidates.
It must be called after SdpEndpoint::generateOffer or SdpEndpoint::processOffer

events.name: OnIceCandidate
events.doc: Notify of a new gathered local candidate.

events.name: OnIceGatheringDone
events.doc: Notify that all candidates have been gathered.

properties.name: candidate
properties.doc: The candidate-attribute as defined in section 15.1 of ICE (rfc5245).

properties.name: sdpMid
properties.doc: If present, this contains the identifier of the 'media stream identification'.

properties.name: sdpMLineIndex
properties.doc: The index (starting at zero) of the m-line in the SDP this candidate is associated with.
